original_body_lines: The Midalana, Magura, Morapitiya, Peleda Galahitiya villages of the Palindanuwara Divisional Secretariat in the Kalutara district were flooded and several houses were affected due to the overflow of the Maguru Ganga. Areas along the Maguru Ganga, Udukumbura and Midalana on the Agalawatta-Kalawana road were under water, and vehicle movements were restricted. Pix by Danushka Lanka Nanayakkara Agalawatte
